Notes

Curt Jones appears through the courtesy of Upstairs Productions Inc. and Dream Records & Tapes Starleana Young appears through the courtesy of Upstairs Productions Inc. and Dream Records & Tapes Steve Arrington appears through the courtesy of It's Still Our Funk Productions and Salsoul Recording Corp.
